settings.hero_title: Sleep Better, Boost Energy, Embrace Wellness
settings.hero_subtitle: Become healthier, happier, and more active with the World’s First Circadian Health Wearable.

settings.meet_subtitle_1: Achieve your health and wellness goals by using your own biology and
settings.meet_subtitle_2: the power of circadian light therapy.

settings.title: Sleep Problems
settings.description: Misaligned circadian rhythm often is associated with difficulties falling asleep, waking up and excessive daytime sleepiness.

settings.title: Low Energy
settings.description: Circadian rhythm disorders are associated with fatigue and reduced cellular energy production.

settings.title: Weight Gain
settings.description: An irregular circadian rhythm greatly contributes to obesity, insulin resistance and metabolic disorders.

settings.title: Low Mood
settings.description: Circadian disruption often contributes to depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder and seasonal affective disorder.

settings.title: Aging
settings.description: Out-of-sync circadian rhythm is associated with aging and morbidity while good circadian health is paramount to longevity.

settings.title: + Every modern disease
settings.description: From cardiovascular disorders to cancer. Sounds incredible? Just Google “circadian rhythm” + any ailment.

settings.card_1_title: Align your lifestyle with your biology
settings.card_1_description: AYO automatically works to align your lifestyle with your circadian rhythm for better sleep, more energy, and improved health. Enjoy personal recommendations for light exposure, optimal sleep-wake times, mealtimes and many more!
settings.card_2_description: Download the AYO app (early access) to learn about your Circadian Health and find out if you are in sync with your biological clock. Discover your body’s unique sleep-wake cycle and natural sleep need as well as how your natural rhythm impacts your everyday life.
settings.card_3_description: Awaken body and mind with gentle blue light that stimulates the eyes, boosts your mood and raises energy levels just like a beautiful sunny day outside.
settings.card_4_description: The AYO app will keep you motivated all year long through seasonal and lifestyle changes. Feel long-lasting improvements as you experience a healthier, happier you.
